title: Dialofy - Easy Dialogue System
shortDescription: Add interactive dialogue to your game in minutes.
longDescription: Create interactive, branching dialogue fast. No coding. Node-based editor. Customizable UI. Supports multi-language & AI-generated dialogue (coming soon). Ideal for RPGs, narratives, and more.

title: Reck - speakeasy
shortDescription: Geoffrey provides you with party games from all around the world.
longDescription: I developed the complete logic and UI/UX design for a drinking game app with a speakeasy aesthetic, a project conceived by a Spanish team looking for a developer to bring their concept to life. I joined the project because I was drawn to the originality of their proposal, and together we created an immersive experience that combines dynamic mechanics with a visually appealing interface consistent with the mysterious and elegant atmosphere of speakeasies.
